75 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e AFE_TriggerIc(void) {
76  LTC_Trigger(&ltc_stateBase);
77  return STD_OK;
78 }
79 
80 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e AFE_Initialize(void) {
81  LTC_InitializeMonitoringPin();
82  return STD_OK;
83 }
84 
85 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e AFE_RequestEepromRead(uint8_t string) {
86  FAS_ASSERT(string < BS_NR_OF_STRINGS);
87  STD_RETURN_TYPE_e retval = STD_OK;
88  LTC_REQUEST_s statereq = {.request = LTC_STATE_EEPROM_READ_REQUEST, .string = string};
89 
90  if (LTC_SetStateRequest(&ltc_stateBase, statereq) != LTC_OK) {
91  retval = STD_NOT_OK;
92  }
93  return retval;
94 }
95 
96 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e AFE_RequestEepromWrite(uint8_t string) {
97  FAS_ASSERT(string < BS_NR_OF_STRINGS);
98  STD_RETURN_TYPE_e retval = STD_OK;
99  LTC_REQUEST_s statereq = {.request = LTC_STATE_EEPROM_WRITE_REQUEST, .string = string};
100 
101  if (LTC_SetStateRequest(&ltc_stateBase, statereq) != LTC_OK) {
102  retval = STD_NOT_OK;
103  }
104  return retval;
105 }
106 
107 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e AFE_RequestTemperatureRead(uint8_t string) {
108  FAS_ASSERT(string < BS_NR_OF_STRINGS);
109  STD_RETURN_TYPE_e retval = STD_OK;
110  LTC_REQUEST_s statereq = {.request = LTC_STATE_TEMP_SENS_READ_REQUEST, .string = string};
111 
112  if (LTC_SetStateRequest(&ltc_stateBase, statereq) != LTC_OK) {
113  retval = STD_NOT_OK;
114  }
115  return retval;
116 }
117 
118 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e AFE_RequestBalancingFeedbackRead(uint8_t string) {
119  FAS_ASSERT(string < BS_NR_OF_STRINGS);
120  STD_RETURN_TYPE_e retval = STD_NOT_OK;
121  LTC_REQUEST_s statereq = {.request = LTC_STATE_BALANCEFEEDBACK_REQUEST, .string = string};
122 
123  if (LTC_SetStateRequest(&ltc_stateBase, statereq) == LTC_OK) {
124  retval = STD_OK;
125  }
126 
127  return retval;
128 }
129 
130 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e AFE_RequestOpenWireCheck(uint8_t string) {
131  FAS_ASSERT(string < BS_NR_OF_STRINGS);
132  STD_RETURN_TYPE_e retval = STD_OK;
133  LTC_REQUEST_s statereq = {.request = LTC_STATE_OPENWIRE_CHECK_REQUEST, .string = string};
134 
135  if (LTC_SetStateRequest(&ltc_stateBase, statereq) != LTC_OK) {
136  retval = STD_NOT_OK;
137  }
138  return retval;
139 }
140 
141 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e AFE_StartMeasurement(void) {
142  STD_RETURN_TYPE_e retval = STD_OK;
143  LTC_REQUEST_s statereq = {.request = LTC_STATE_INIT_REQUEST, .string = 0x0u};
144 
145  if (LTC_SetStateRequest(&ltc_stateBase, statereq) != LTC_OK) {
146  retval = STD_NOT_OK;
147  }
148  return retval;
149 }
150 
151 extern bool AFE_IsFirstMeasurementCycleFinished(void) {
152  return LTC_IsFirstMeasurementCycleFinished(&ltc_stateBase);
153 }
154 
155 extern STD_RETURN_TYPE_e AFE_RequestIoRead(uint8_t string) {
156  FAS_ASSERT(string < BS_NR_OF_STRINGS);
157 
158  STD_RETURN_TYPE_e retval = STD_NOT_OK;
159 
160  return (retval);
161 }
162 
163 STD_RETURN_TYPE_e AFE_RequestIoWrite(uint8_t string) {
164  FAS_ASSERT(string < BS_NR_OF_STRINGS);
165 
166  STD_RETURN_TYPE_e retval = STD_NOT_OK;
167 
168  return (retval);
169 }
